evidence.claim: Genotox Laboratories utilizes AWS for cloud computing services to manage data storage and processing.
They implement FHIR standards for health data integration and interoperability.
The website mentions compliance with HIPAA for data privacy in handling patient information.
Integration with EHRs is part of their service offerings, providing interoperability with healthcare providers.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse operations found.
